altTitles.ja: ボーイ・ミーツ・ハーレム

description.en:
1. Nangoku♥Harem (South Country Harem)
What do you get when you go on a school field trip to the southern islands and your plane crashes and the only survivors are the teacher you are in love with, two popular girls of the class, and a hot flight attendant?

2. Yukiyama♥Harem (Snow Mountain Harem)
Sequel to South Country Harem, our hero finds himself stranded with a bunch of girls in a small cabin.

3-4. Nettai♥Harem (Tropical Harem)
Our hero find himself stranded on another tropical paradise and this time he is captured by the locals and they are a women tribe who view him as nothing more than breeding stock to produce children with.

5. Deatte♥Harem (Harem Encounter)
A guy, unlucky with romance, takes his chances with a dating web site?and ended up getting three girls at once for a date.
